website_summaries.verdict: This hat offers attractive sun protection in a unisex style. It's also crafted by a top name in outdoor wear.
pros: Durable nylon poplin material features moisture-wicking and UPF 50 sun protection
Available in versatile neutral colors that include sage, boulder, steel, fossil, grill, white, and peat moss
cons: Size runs on the small side
Brim is somewhat floppy, which could get annoying in windy conditions

customer_reviews.title: ***Warning*** SPF concerns
customer_reviews.text: ***Warning*** This hat includes 50SPF(sun protection factor) to keep the sun off your head/neck/ears on those hot sunny days at the beach/hiking/yard work. What they don't tell you is that it also includes 100SPF (Sex Prevention Factor). While wearing this hat it vastly reduces one's chance of seducing your partner. My wife has stated repeatedly that my chances are 100% not happening. Otherwise it is a fantastic hat.
customer_reviews.author: Random Guy

customer_reviews.title: Good adjustable sun hat. May inspire silliness.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this hat for my husband. It inspired him to dance around until I had to ask him to please stop. I said it is an outdoorsman hat, and he said he was a "dad gum ole prospector" and added a few kicks and leaps. Then he said it was too loose, so I showed him the sizing mechanism. This pleased him, so he began making muscle man poses and I left the room.
customer_reviews.author: CSM

customer_reviews.title: This hat has truly transformed my life and it protects my skin so I’m at my best for frog school every day
customer_reviews.text: This hat changed my life. I have become a complete jungle man. Frogs immediately gravitate to me. I’ve started a frog training school. The only part of my old life that I’ve brought with me is my beloved coffee mug. This hat has truly transformed my life and it protects my skin so I’m at my best for frog school every day. Seriously, buy this hat. It's incredible.
customer_reviews.author: Lance Jonn Romanoff

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and Functional!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit!!! I was worried about this being one size men’s (I am a woman with a size small head) but the toggle in the back makes this hat perfect for I would say most any head size. I bought this for the beach so the neck tie will come in handy too. This hat is very lightweight yet made very well. Super pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: In 107 Degrees - It's Cool
customer_reviews.text: Currently in a very hot northern Thailand, and this hat has done everything expected. It folds, it breathes, it stays on, and I don't think it makes me look a dork. 6 stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Richards

customer_reviews.title: Great for the pool or beach!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband for Father's Day and he loves it! We spend a lot of time at the pool and the ocean and it does a great job of protecting the sun from his face and neck. Thinking about getting one for myself as well!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Dippo

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, floppy, wrinkly
customer_reviews.text: This hat is highly overpriced and low quality. It arrived wrinkled but thought I'd take a chance on it. My chance failed. The hat looked soggy, wrinkled and terrible out of the bag and looks worse now. I never wear it and wouldn't suggest anyone should. This weekend I bought a Solar Escape hat at Costco for $13.99. The shape is much better; the brim is re-enforced and doesn't sag, and the material is not wrinkled. This Columbia hat, at $24.99 is a complete rip-off and I won't by Columbia brands again.
customer_reviews.author: heybrian

customer_reviews.title: Not fashionable, but not sunburned!
customer_reviews.text: I looked ridiculous. My female friends and family jad beautiful straw sunhats that could have been Garden Party hats. But guess who didn't get sunburned!? This girl! Also, the draw string to adjust the head size was perfect for tucking a bun up into it and then cinching tight underneath. I have no photos, because I was aware of the dork factor. But also, I had crying children and sand up my butt so do I really care? Nah. Comfortable, washes well and provides PLENTY of good shade. Took it to the beach, camping, and Sea World. Function over fashion, people!
customer_reviews.author: jessmtnz

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SUN HAT
customer_reviews.text: I have several of these hats now in different colors. I ordered the white because I thought it would look nicer wearing out to events than some of the other colors I use for mostly yard work. The hat is lightweight and provides great coverage on my head, face and back of my neck. The vents on it help keep my head cool while wearing it. I have washed these multiple times with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ordered Two Identical - Got two very different
customer_reviews.text: One hat was new, and one was used and "washed" (note puckered seams on brim). Two different colors. Different hardware. Different UPC codes on tags. Different Sizes, one so small it would not fit on my head, the other "unwashed, new" one fit fine with room to spare. What gives?
customer_reviews.author: Rancho Guy 4

customer_reviews.title: So ugly he’ll never lose it
customer_reviews.text: I bought my boyfriend a good-looking expensive Panama hat, which he promptly left in an amusement park. This hat has a dorky drawstring so he’ll never lose it. Packs flat, weighs nothing, makes him look like Gilligan but at least he isn’t sunburned.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Keep looking...
customer_reviews.text: The brim of the hat is unfortunately the biggest issue with this hat. Completely soft brim no reinforcement constantly Falls in your view. Very disappointed, I wanted the brim to keep the sun off my neck but since the brim of the Hat seems to rest on my neck, ears, and face there's no protection.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Pate

customer_reviews.title: Keeps Its Shape
customer_reviews.text: I have had this hat for almost a year, and used it almost exclusively for hiking trips. That means it gets stuffed into a pack, taken out as needed and generally knocked around. It keeps the sun off your face and neck and it breathes nicely and dries quickly. Probably the thing I have been most impressed by, though, is the way it's held its shape. you can roll it up to almost nothing to stuff into a pack and then take it out, shake it, and put it on- it's as if you never rolled it. Great hat - highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Steve NH

customer_reviews.title: Great hat for the outdoors, even for my abnormally large head.
customer_reviews.text: I have a cranium size that is much larger than average but this hat seems to do well stretching to the user's head without creating any kind of abnormal tightness. It provides great shade for when I am mowing my lawn or gardening. The only downside is that the strap keeps grazing my chin and it gets super annoying. My choice was to just bring the string part onto of the hat, which forces the brim to bend like a taco shell. It's not ideal, but I would not want to cut the sting since it is still useful for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Mephesto

customer_reviews.title: Sucks.
customer_reviews.text: After a short while hat gets limp and flimsy. I will donate it to a homeless person on a freeway offramp standing in the harsh L.A. sunshine and spend more on a quality one.
customer_reviews.author: Judicious

customer_reviews.title: DONT GET IT WET - AND DONT WASTE YOUR MONEY!!!
customer_reviews.text: ZERO STARS IS WHAT THIS DESERVES!!! What a joke - this hat covers your head which might protect you from the sun, but the moment it gets the least bit wet the brim HANGS STRAIGHT DOWN like ribbons on a freaking easter bonnet... What a total embarrassment to the Columbia name! Don’t waste your money buying this HORRIBLE product! Shop somewhere else if you don’t want to waste your money!!!
customer_reviews.author: FloriDad76

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable After 8+ Hours...
customer_reviews.text: I wear this hat for 8+ hours fishing on a boat. Most of the time I wear it with sunglasses. I rarely ever wear hats because I have "strong hair" but this saves my face and neck from scorching sun and applying sunscreen all day long. At first I was skeptical because of reviews mentioning flimsy rim, I didn't have an issue. The rim is pliable, seems to stay where I want it without constant adjustment and doesn't get in my way. Glad I bought it, if the hat didn't have the strap and I lost it in a gust I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Everything else about the hat is great.
customer_reviews.text: Would be 5 stars if the brim would stay close to flat. I realize it's a booney and not a rigid hat, but the right side of the brim almost touches my shoulder while the left side of the brim is relatively flat. Everything else about the hat is great. 90 day update - I really wanted to love this hat. Huge Columbia products fan. This hat, though, is unwearable in any breeze or moisture (including perspiration) exposure. Flops down actually touching my ears and sometimes also in the front, which blocks my vision.
customer_reviews.author: Ken F.

customer_reviews.title: This hat fits large heads!
customer_reviews.text: I have a large head, and I wasn't sure about a one size fits all. But this hat slipped over the wide part of my head, and is very comfortable to wear. The brim is wide enough to shield the sun except for when it's at it's lowest points in the sky. The ventilation works great. My old hat had two tiny holes that never seemed to let the steam out, but I can feel the breeze going through this hat. So far, so good. I would recommend this hat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good sun hat
customer_reviews.text: Moisture wicking? Not so sure it is. My scalp is soaked after walking an hour or so early morning in warm (80's), humid weather. If I walk later in the day, my hair and scalp are totally soaked. And I truly do not perspire more than most people. I'm keeping it because I don't see any other hats around that might be better. I've asked friends who have Tilley's and other expensive brands. Their experience is not very different from mine.
customer_reviews.author: Zippy

customer_reviews.title: Best hat for the lake
customer_reviews.text: I love this hat and so does my sister since she always uses more than I would actually like to haha. But it gives me lots of coverage when I’m out on the lake and it’s a cute subtle color. Also pretty random but I dropped it in the water and it didn’t sink! I’ve had hats that have sunken before and it breaks my heart because I can’t swim 60 ft to get them but I just think it’s a plus that it doesn’t sink!
customer_reviews.author: Sophia Carrera

customer_reviews.title: Light and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The booney hat is light and comfortable on your head. it's great for hiking and sun protection. My only issue with it is 2 things. The brim gets floppy and would've been nicer if it was stiffer to contour the shape. The other I didn't like, on a hot day the sweat moisture will wicker down to the brim and will flop down by the moisture weight. s
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie Gella

customer_reviews.title: Color Wrong (misleading picture) very floppy brim
customer_reviews.text: Not happy when I received my hat because the picture showed a nice deep green color but I received a grey one. This hat is also extremely floppy and has no structure. The brim sags all over and droops right in the front which looks awful. Bad product, do not reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: HallaDurg

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: This hat drives me crazy with any breeze the brim flips up and stays up so I have to pull it down every time. I keep thinking I look like Gomer Pyle! I would like to give it 2 1/2 stars because it does have good ventilation and helps in the heat.
customer_reviews.author: R. Sippel

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and functional
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it’s a dorky hat, but I kinda love it. The floppy design makes it easy to pack, and it really helps protect you from the sun. Made of thin but sturdy material, with side vents to keep your head cool. I normally wear a XXL in hats, and this hat fits perfect at the widest setting. There’s a draw string you can tighten if you have a normal sized head.
customer_reviews.author: DJS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sun hat
customer_reviews.text: Took these on vacation to Hawaii - ordered the navy, the sage and the steel. They worked perfectly to block the sun while paddle boarding, hiking, walking on the beach, anything outside. Wore it every day for 2 weeks! Chin strap tightens for windy conditions. Brim isn't so wide that you can't see out from under it. Adjustable around the head and under the chin. My husband, kids and I all wore these hats comfortably. Washes well - I hung or laid ours to dry just to make sure they didn't shrink or dry oddly. Dries quickly when you fall off said paddle board with the hat on! Soft, cool fabric. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie S.

customer_reviews.title: Too small for males
customer_reviews.text: Way too small for my average male head. Can’t the people at this great outdoor company get this right? Who wants to be doing a strenuous activity with a tight hat. I have bought this before and it used to be bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Spinozist

customer_reviews.title: Light but not Much sun protection
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight. Oddly enough - not much sun protection. My face was out & ready to be hit. I don't think my mouth & chin were ever protected unless i was facing away from the sun or it was dark. I was surprised. It's VERY breathable though. Is floppy but the chinstrap will keep it from flying away. Beware of wind - will also expose your entire face to the elements. Ended up returning it because it wasn't what i was looking for
customer_reviews.author: Yves

customer_reviews.title: Multifunctional GREAT buy
customer_reviews.text: Was in the matter for a hat that I can use in many outdoor settings. This one is perfect for any outdoor activity (hikes, beach, fishing, gardening, paddle boarding, outdoor cocktail hour 😊🍻. ) What I love : -comes in many colors -super comfortable -adjustable head band -rain proof -easily washable -very well made Only downfall for me is that I thought it was a little pricey for my liking.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle B.

customer_reviews.title: A very light quality sun hat
customer_reviews.text: This is a great sun hat. It fits me like a glove and has an easy way to adjust it to just about anyone's head within the size range ordered. I live in Florida and need a lot of sunshade while I'm walking outside. What is great about this hat is how light it is. You don't even know you are wearing it, though it does a great job of shading your face and back from the sun. It's made of good material that can be easily washed and just feels like a quality cap. It was a little more expensive than other off-brand hats, but I feel it was worth the extra money paid.
customer_reviews.author: DigitalEagle

customer_reviews.title: Fits me perfect and i wear 7 5/8
customer_reviews.text: this hat fits me and I am a 7 5/8 hat wearer. i was skeptic at first since i was reading the Q&A and review and some said that it was a tight fit for peeps with 7 5/8 head. I took the jump and bought it since i have Amazon Prime and could easily return it if it doesn't fit. Turns out i did'nt need to. Fit perfectly and could be cinched dowm for a more secure fit. Maybe those people who wear 7 5/8 had long hair or something. This hat was perfect since it was light and loved that the mesh helps me from having a soaked head when its hot and you are sweating like crazy.
customer_reviews.author: Albert

customer_reviews.title: Fits as described
customer_reviews.text: Like some reviewers, I have a larger than average noggin (around 7 1/2), so was pleasantly surprised that this not only fit, but doesn't look small and 'cartoonish' on my head (you fellow large-sizers know exactly what I mean). As mentioned elsewhere, there's an adjustment strap/cord, but I didn't need to alter that in any way. I haven't test-driven this in hot weather, but the vents and light-weight material seem promising, and I'll report back after my trip to Jamaica later this month if there are any other follow-on comments.
customer_reviews.author: Bass Guy

customer_reviews.title: Finally, a hat that will fit my large head
customer_reviews.text: This has everything I need. It fits my head, can be tied/tightened for windy days, and is vented to keep my noggin from overheating on those intense sunny days. My only complaint is the way they ship it. It's folded over, and you have to get the crease out of it in order for the brim to sit right on your head. That isn't annoying enough to remove any stars, but they should get feedback regarding that.
customer_reviews.author: Teknurd

customer_reviews.title: and this works better for me because the brim part is horizontal and ...
customer_reviews.text: My older version of this hat finally gave out after few years. The top part got torn from the brim part. The fabric got brittle. When I washed after many washes before, I found it torn. The brim part of this hat is different from the older version. It feels more flimsy to me. I am not wearing it. I purchased Siggi Wide Brim Summer Flap Bill Cap Cotton Hat Neck Cover UPF 50+ also....and this works better for me because the brim part is horizontal and does not slant downward. I am not affiliated with anybody
customer_reviews.author: Hiker

customer_reviews.title: Awesome hat
customer_reviews.text: Awesome head even when sweating like crazy the brim stays solid doesn't flop all over you I was laying mulch in 105° heat index sweating like crazy and all my sweat was dripping off the brim and not in my face won't ever buy any other kind
customer_reviews.author: jason orourke

customer_reviews.title: SUN HAT
customer_reviews.text: I work outside in the heat and I learned FAST how useful a good sun hat is. When the heat is on full blast, the top of your head will feel like its melting without this thing on. The hat has a nice wide brim to deflect the heat out of your eyes and will keep your noggin from burning up.
customer_reviews.author: Mills

customer_reviews.title: Father’s Day win!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband absolutely loves his new hat I got him this Father’s Day. He loved it so much we got one for my dad as well. He has been swimming with it and it dries super quickly. The back is easily adjusted to fit his head comfortably. It’s also very breathable with the netting around the head. It’s perfect for hot days he just dunks the hat into the pool and wears it. The brim is a great size not to big but big enough it provides full face protection.
customer_reviews.author: Christina R.

customer_reviews.title: Great design
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight. My main reason I kept this hat was that they offered a light color to reflect sun and yet the underside was darker to absorb sun. Meaning, less sun is reflected on my face! Few sun hats offer this, yet this color design is used in golf and baseball hats. I wish it had a bit of a wider brim, I still have to look downward to get the sun glare off my eyes. The chin strap is a lifesaver for windy days.
customer_reviews.author: OCD

customer_reviews.title: Big ole Dome BUT this is a hat that actually fits!
customer_reviews.text: I have a large head so I never wear hats however I have a festival coming up and a Hawaii trip so wanted some kind of hat since I'm bald. After looking at all these random hats on Amazon, I went with this Columbia, more so because of the name & pricing as compared to others. Now, I have a huge dome (Last I remember hat size was about a 7 3/4 or so) and I am so surprised that the hat fits. Hell, I can even tighten it a bit more for a tighter fit! Definitely recommend this hat although it will get really tested next weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.L33

customer_reviews.title: These are fabulous hats
customer_reviews.text: We first bought a couple of these for a trip to Italy, one for me and one for my son. Then my daughter started wearing mine. Even though she's a lot smaller, the hat can be adjusted so it fits well and she liked it better than her other options. My kids are both fair-skinned, and the hats provide great sun protection. I'm coming back now to get another one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: B Griggs

customer_reviews.title: Good hat.
customer_reviews.text: 6' guy, 215 lbs and a normal sized hat: No problems wearing this hat. Might be different if your head is the size of a barrel... I like its lightweight feel. The quality seems okay, for a made in Asia item. I would recommend the hat. The price tag though is on the high side. 25 dollars is way too much. You find this at Marshall's for half of that.
customer_reviews.author: Lari

customer_reviews.title: Really nice hat
customer_reviews.text: I read all the recent reviews, just to be educated as to what I was getting. This hat really doesn't disappoint, especially for my intended use, which is just protecting my head from sunburn on those long days during exposure. Sure the bill around it is quite unstructured, but it's certainly not just fabric flopping. I would recommend it, and buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey R.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Honest-Looking!
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice hat that does a good job of keeping the sun off of my face and neck while mowing lawns in the summer. I run a lawncare business and spend much a lot of time in the sun, so I wanted face and neck protection; this serves that purpose. I also like the drawstring feature, as I use it to tighten the hat around the bandanna that I wear underneath the hat to keep the sweat out of my eyes. I also think the hat looks nice (I think all the old ladies that I cut lawns for like it...haha) even though most people probably don't consider this type of head-ware a fashion item.
customer_reviews.author: I. Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Great hat
customer_reviews.text: I'm an outdoorsy guy with very fair skin, so I've had quite a few sun hats over the years, and I really like this one. It's sturdy and well made, crushable, packable, and looks nice. If you're counting ounces in your backpack or want the absolute lightest and quickest drying, this one might be a little heavier than you want. But it feels like it'll last for a long time and, though I was skeptical of the one-size-fits-all sizing, even fits over my large noggin comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor

customer_reviews.title: Beyond Ugly
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was the same hat I had (same name, same maker) and loved, but it's not. Unless you have a large head, this will fit like a potato sack. And the drawstring adjustment makes it even worse. Even a light breeze makes the brim flop all over the place. And the chin strap is so far back it's over the ears. Just a horrible design even if it does seem to be make OK.
customer_reviews.author: G. Smith

customer_reviews.title: The must-have hat.
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic hat. It is extremely light. It's very easily foldable to fit in your back pocket or travel bag. It dries very quickly. It is the perfect Fisherman's hat, camping hat, Beach walking hat, or any other outdoor fun activities you enjoy. Keep the sun off of your head and stay cool, and you look cool too!
customer_reviews.author: DeFelice Family

customer_reviews.title: Great for Summer Canyons Trip
customer_reviews.text: Used it for our hikes through Bryce, Zion, and Grand Canyon. Helped keep sun out of the way and lightweight. Breathed well enough for me but at the time I had a buzzed haircut so I'm not sure how it would perform for someone with hair. Will be using it again for our hikes in Glacier National Park this summer. Here's a pic at the top of Observation Point at Zion with it.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Great sun hat - not cheap and flimsy!
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Very adjustable with the drawstring and push-button clasp at the back of the crown. Although quite light and "floppy," the material it's made of looks to be very strong and durable (not like the kind that would fray easily or eventually). This will definitely do the job to protect from the rays and stay cool. There's ample venting on the crown and the brim is wide enough all around to keep the sun away. I saw some similar looking sun hats that were much cheaper -- but I think you get what you pay for, though...and this one is well worth the extra cost because of its excellent quality and design.
customer_reviews.author: birdonamission

customer_reviews.title: Does not play well with water.
customer_reviews.text: It's okay, but does not warrant the price in my opinion. I've found that If it gets wet, it's just turns into a floppy mess and never really stays firm after that. I will likely go with another brand that retains its shape better as well has has some sort of snaps or something for me to pin the left and right sides of the hat to the head piece. I can't really recommend this to anyone looking to take it on or near water.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This hat is great for the beach or working outside. It’s lightweight and the mesh side keeps my head from over heating. I even use the chin strap when the wind picks up on the beach or I’m on the riding mower. This is a highly functional and comfortable hat.
customer_reviews.author: MommmaMi

customer_reviews.title: Floppy brim.
customer_reviews.text: So the hat looks nice and fits fine. The main problem I have had with it is the brim. It isn't made of thick material and one side flops down and doesn't stay up blocking my view. If it's remotely windy out not sides do it and sometimes the front will come down as well. I'm writing as I sit on the beach with half my face covered up by the floppy brim.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Best value for quality tropical head gear.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hat, and one other from a different manufacturer. This one from Columbia, was over twice the price of my other choice. I'd say it's well worth the money and far superior to several other sun/tropical hats I've tried. Very light weight, the brim is not too soft or flexible, yet holds its shape well in both a light wind and mild rain. Adjustable for size. And, has a chin strap you can use to hold it on your head, or flip up and adjust to hold the brim up from the sides of your head. We'll be taking ours to Machu Pichu and the Amazon River headwaters.
customer_reviews.author: Rick C.

customer_reviews.title: White is actually white and gray.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the hat but assumed it looked as pictured. I purchased the white and it has a lot of grey on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon shopper

customer_reviews.title: Stays put!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this hat! I needed a hat with more sun protection and this is perfect. But the part is that it doesn’t blow off. I live in the desert and it can get super windy. The adjustable band works awesome. I don’t have to cinch the chin strap, which I hate to do and it stays put. It may. It be the most attractive thing but it works awesome!
customer_reviews.author: volvomom

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy as hell.  Wear it on a day with no wind.
customer_reviews.text: One of my worst purchases in a long time. The wind flips the front up and I have to hold on the the front to keep the sun out of my eyes. Why isn't the rim firm???? Come on. I sprayed a ton of starch on the rim to stiffen it up but it only works a little and wears off eventually. If the wind is not blowing or at your back, then it works okay. I was tempted to glue some cardboard underneath the rim to keep it from flapping all the time. Not good. Rip off.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Fine for a large head.
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 7 3/8 hat. There is still a bit of wiggle room, and the elastic drawstring tightens it right up. The brim will never be nice and straight, but it will definitely help to prevent a burn on my ears. The hatband has a slot on each side. You will get a little sun on the top of your head from the mesh vents.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Wayne Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Very small
customer_reviews.text: Quality of the hat is great. Unfortunately it seems that their hats seem to run very small... I measured my head as 22.5", and this is tight even on my head - leaves a line on my forehead each time I wear it. Very surprising since this is the first time a "One size" has been too small for me.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Floppy brim not great in windy conditions.
customer_reviews.text: Hat works great for keeping sun off my ears, neck, and face, but in windy conditions, the brim is all over the place. Fits great though. I have a large head (7 7/8 to an 8 in fitted baseball hat size) and this fits well. I don't have much extra room, but it still fits comfortably on my head and doesn't blow off.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: ... a ton of hair which has caused me to hate hats. That being said I had to buy ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a big head and a ton of hair which has caused me to hate hats. That being said I had to buy one for kayaking since I burn so easily and from the moment I tried this on it was light comfortable with a wide enough brim and can be secured if needed. I purchased another one the next day for my husband since he also liked it as much as I did.
customer_reviews.author: Dove

customer_reviews.title: Dont like how the rim fairs against the wind
customer_reviews.text: This is my first booney. I used to wear the regular caps on my hikes and trips, but when i tried out this booney, it was so comfortable, lightweight and GREAT airflow. It's easy to fold down and stash into your pocket. But there is a HUGE drawback, which is the rim of the booney, it offers great sun protection, only when it isnt windy, due to the lightweight structure of this hat, the wind can blow the rim around and expose your face to the sun shine.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth B.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what is needed if you spend time in the sun!
customer_reviews.text: This hat is awesome! Color is a light tan with under rim dark, which is great for sun reflection because the dark color will absorb the light and not reflect in to your eyes! I don't usually look good in hats but this one does NOT make me look like a dork. I kinda think I look cute! It fits great with my hair in a ponytail which is a plus too! You can wear the chin strap to the back if you like. It can be sized easily with a pull cord that goes around the head part. Great for packing in small spaces. Hand washable too!
customer_reviews.author: ThiaTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: I wear a hat whenever I am outside as a matter of sun protection for head, neck and face. This hat is super lightweight, but that comes at the price of a floppy brim that can be somewhat bothersome in windy conditions. It is best packed flat because rolling will increase the floppy potential of the brim. It is cool as hats go, due to lightweight fabric and adequate ventilation. The underside of the brim is dark fabric which reduces glare under some circumstances. It's not a Tilly, but it's 1/4th the price, making it a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas P. Griggs

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good!
customer_reviews.text: From the the late morning until late afternoon this hat provides the perfect amount of cover. Before that time frame and afterwards, the sun is just too low on the horizon and the sun will still shine on your face/neck. I would say that during "ideal" hours your face/neck is still only covered about 90%. Plus, the material is so floppy that a breeze will flip up the brim and leave you briefly exposed. Overall, I like the hat and was certainly a good choice.
customer_reviews.author: Jarhead

customer_reviews.title: A Winner for Big Heads
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what it says - folds down to any shape, keeps the sun off my neck and face, it's lightweight, adjustable, and most importantly - it fits my extra large melon head (7 3/4) comfortably. I wished the color of the mesh matched the color of the hat but it does keep my head cool. Overall I like it and I'll buy another in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: Olympic View

customer_reviews.title: sturdy and long lasting
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd columbia hat like this I've bought in 10 years. I tend to get about 5 years out of them before they wear out. This latest one seems a bit stiffer than the last 2 which I think is a good thing because when it's raining the others tended to get floppy and I'd have to rearrange to keep the brim out of my face. other than that, it keeps the sun off and makes me happy
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Rikard

customer_reviews.title: You won't regret it
customer_reviews.text: Great hats for summertime in the outdoors. We purchased two for hiking several national parks in the west during August.... these were life savers!
customer_reviews.author: Travis B.

customer_reviews.title: This hat eliminates many others!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hat for the beach bum in me, and for the hiking protection it provides. I absolutely love this hat! It is supper light weight, well made, and can be totally abused in packing for travel. If I were to lose this hat, I would be ordering another asap. It really is a wonderful design that invited you to keep it on your head!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Impulse buy. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on a whim, as it had the most positive reviews on amazon. Sure enough it fits well and looks good. I don’t like sun hats that are obnoxiously large and look janky. This isn’t too overly large. It will work fine. Less sun is always a positive thing! The draw string in the back to tighten the inner brim is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: flightguy

customer_reviews.title: Bora Bora Booney Hat
customer_reviews.text: I have bought these hats for each of my grandkids that have decided they want to go hiking and camping. They all have enjoyed having them. It keeps the sun off and still allows air to get in. The hat is worth the money
customer_reviews.author: marian

customer_reviews.title: This fits my big freakin head with ease
customer_reviews.text: I do a lot of field work so needed a floppy brim booney hat to keep the sun off my delicate bald spot and provide some general shade for my peepers. Since I have a 7 5/8" head I could never find what I needed at retail stores. This hat does the trick. Slightly elastic but not too tight, it fits me perfectly. Now I can look really cool and stay cool at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Love the blue
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband who now wears it outside every time he mows the yard. Columbia is a quality brand. I like the color choices available as he prefers blue to khaki and I hadn't seen these color options anywhere else. Quality construction. He says it keeps the sun out of his eyes, helps protect against sun burn on his face and back of his neck but isn't hot. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Great Sun Protection👍
customer_reviews.text: I always thought these hats looked silly but after last spring camping in the North Fruita Desert I ordered this hat. It actually looks good and is very functional. Pros: Drys really fast Super lightweight Great sun protection👍 Good venting on top Drawstring makes fitment easy Cons: It's a little floppy in the wind or on a boat Overall great hat and I would buy a again if I lost it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Chronic

customer_reviews.title: Floppy brim is worthless for sun protection
customer_reviews.text: This hat has the lightest, floppiest brim I have ever seen on a boonie hat. The slightest breeze sends the brim vertical, providing zero sun protection. Yes, the hat is lightweight and comfortable but unless it is 100% calm and still this hat is worthless for sun protection. I recommend looking into the TruSpec boonie hats which are very well made and do not pose this issue. I unfortunately bought the Columbia boonie to replace a lost TruSpec and will be ordering a new TruSpec to replace the Columbia asap. Columbia should be ashamed of putting their logo in this low quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Great hat!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome hat! Very lightweight, nice color and fits all. I would have kept this hat but I decided to purchase something similar but with a neck flap. I needed to get a hat to protect my neck because I tend to get burned on my neck quite often. Plus, I wanted better protection from a hat for my upcoming Cabo trip. If this same company made this hat with a neck flap, I would buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Saradpon Photography

customer_reviews.title: Super lightweight, perfect for summer!
customer_reviews.text: I’d been looking for a great lightweight booney style hat since my old Carhartt hat had finally given out. Carhartt no longer made the one I had grown to love but found this one. It’s very lightweight, the mesh at the top allows it to breathe and the material dries very quick. I use it for working outside, in the garden, and mowing grass. I may order another one in gray for hiking.
customer_reviews.author: CabinLife2011

customer_reviews.title: Order the color that's LISTED, not by the image color.
customer_reviews.text: I selected the impulse blue hat even though it showed a white hat image. I received the impulse blue hat. Make sure you select the color that is listed. Do not order by the image color. This is a great hat. It provides perfect shade and very cool in the summer. It's very lightweight and dries quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Belle

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: The hat fits very comfortably and never got too hot. I wore it a week doing everything from physical activity, sitting around a campfire, riding in a side-by-side, and fishing in rain and sun. If I have one complaint it's that mosquitos can bite through the mesh. But that's a fine line between cooling and mosquito bites. I think I had three in a week... I'll take it.
customer_reviews.author: DR Rizzles

customer_reviews.title: Surprise - Its perfect
customer_reviews.text: I had reservations when ordering this product. But not now. This meets every need and desire I had. I have a large head and find it difficult, to say the least, to find something that fits. I am so happy and relieved that this is one I will enjoy for a long time. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy S.

customer_reviews.title: Light breathable hat, dries fast.
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't sure I would like this type of hat, but needed one for sun protection. I've worn it 1 day and I love it, never had the sun in my eyes. If it gets hot get the hat wet and it's like an air conditioner. Lots of venting in the hat and I never felt like my head was hot from wearing a hat all day.
customer_reviews.author: Sheev Palpatine

customer_reviews.title: Awesome hat for sunny days
customer_reviews.text: This hat is awesome! Some sunhats have brims that are too large or too small. This brim is the perfect size.. I love every detail about the hat’s construction and the materials used. I dont see color fading or longevity being an issue. Very lightweight hat that offers great protection from the sun
customer_reviews.author: Manny

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great fishing hat.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my husband. He loves it more than I could ever imagine. It keeps sun off neck and face, super light weight, has neck tie piece so it won’t get lost in the wind. Only feedback is that the brim is fairly wide, perhaps too wide. Great product for the price. Can’t speak to long term durability at this time.
customer_reviews.author: JSMeff

customer_reviews.title: Best Hat on the market
customer_reviews.text: Love this hat. Bought one over 10 years ago and it recently ripped. Was happy to upgrade to the newer version. Comfortable, cool and light, this hat folds nicely to fit into almost any bag or pocket. I love wetting it to help cool on hot days. Adjustable tension band is great. Hat stays on even when boating. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: OffDay

customer_reviews.title: Comfort & style, what's not to like?
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't entirely sure how I would like the Columbia Bora Bora hat when I ordered it, but I took a chance because it is very inexpensive. I am so happy I bought this hat! It is very light and fits brilliantly on my head, which is VERY large! I am really happy about the under the chin string allowing easy removal from on top the head to letting it rest around the front of your neck and draping it onto your back. I received many compliments on it at the outdoor events I've attended! Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Wene

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: It has the perfect amount of coverage to protect the face and neck area from sun while the mesh part is able to perfect helping keep your head cool. Better than a baseball cap. Perfect to travel since it is so lightweight, you can easily fold it up and put it in your day pack.

customer_reviews.title: purc
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a deep sea boating trip. Quality appeared to be fine. It was obviously going to be too floppy to wear in the breeze while underway. Plus it just looks stupid on anyone. Ended up using Columbia Mens Schooner Bank Cachalot Hat - a ballcap style hat with a sunshade for the back of your neck that can be folded away. Returned the Bora Bora Booney II
customer_reviews.author: E Rogers

customer_reviews.title: You will NOT regret this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I have yet to be dissapointed in anything from Columbia. This hat is AWESOME. It kept me dry in a downpour out in the gulf of Mexico, and also kept the rain out of my face in heavy downpours on a kayaking trip. Does a great job at protecting you from the sun as well. Great product for a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Jake Marler

customer_reviews.title: Effective, foldable, and quick to dry!
customer_reviews.text: Keeps you cool and or of the sun. Fairly breathable. File easy to stuff in a pocket. On the hottest days,I like to drink my hat in water and wear it until it dries. This keeps me cool and keeps me from getting a sunburn! This allows me too beat the heat!
customer_reviews.author: TerryTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Sun and attractive women repellent
customer_reviews.text: I use this hat for my honeymoon in Greece and not only did it repel the sun from my face but it also kept my new wife out of very safe distance and for some reason when I would talk to people it actually made her face red. Not sure why this hat has that effect but you might figure it out if you buy one too. You should complete the look with the Columbia silver ridge ii vest. It is a great way to make new friends and lose the old ones. Awesome noggin shield
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Kaysen

customer_reviews.title: Great Hat
customer_reviews.text: Great hat for blocking the sun. Made from synthetic material so there is no problems using it in pools of beach. The cord to hold is is pretty tights, doesn't get lose which is great. It also has very good ventilation. The only thing to consider is that it is "one size fits all" but not actually true, I have a small head (use flexfit size S for comparison) and it fits me perfect, but wouldn't fit the same for some one else with larger head.
customer_reviews.author: RDU23

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for when I work on the backyard as I’ve been doing a big project. It works great on the Florida sun, it protects me while not making me hot. I recommend this hat a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Edgaba

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the sun of my face
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. The brim is quite flexible and goes with the wind. Not a bad thing, I'm just saying it's not a wired or hard brim. I have sunglasses with the PilotFish strap, so I can't pull the back of the hat down as far as I like. But I guess that all depends on the sunglasses shape and your ear height ha ha. It still is comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Brim of Hat is Gray
customer_reviews.text: I needed a white hat that would offer sun protection for an upcoming cruise. I was very disappointed that the inside brim of the hat is a dark gray. As a result, the look I was going for is not there. I haven't used it yet so I can't speak to the sun protection. The hat does appear to be well made and the fit was fine. Had the inside been white as well, I would have given it five stars!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Spears

customer_reviews.title: It works for me
customer_reviews.text: It may not be a great looking hat, but it is easy to clean and dries quickly. I perspire a lot from my head and it helps keep me cooler and wicks perspiration away too. It also easily folds and I use 1 around the house and have one folded in the Spyder to use for protecting my bald top when the helmet comes off
customer_reviews.author: KEN

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Hat
customer_reviews.text: Likes: that it allowed air flow in hot weather; quality feels good Dislike: loses it shape after one washing. Overall: very good quality hat.
customer_reviews.author: CD

customer_reviews.title: Beat the sun
customer_reviews.text: I am an HVAC service technician. I am in the sun All Summer Long. Been looking for a good hat to get sun off my face and neck. This has worked out very well for me. The hat is comfortable and breathable. Keeps the sun off of me and keeps me so much cooler than before. I would recommend this to anyone that wants to be out in the sun but not have the sun directly on their head
customer_reviews.author: Joe J.

customer_reviews.title: The hat is light and keeps your head cool. I have a fairly large head with lots ...
customer_reviews.text: The hat is light and keeps your head cool. I have a fairly large head with lots of hair, but this hat seems to be a one size fits all with an adjustable bungee. I like that I can adjust the hat based on my hairstyle or the amount of wind. I've washed it several times and let it air dry, and it still looks like new. Highly recommend this hat for the fit and fact that it keeps the sun out of my face, keeps my head relatively cool, and is very comfortable. I sometimes like to place a bandanna under the hat to cover my neck.
customer_reviews.author: saraf

customer_reviews.title: Great value for a great hat.
customer_reviews.text: Great hat. Has that flimsy yet sturdy quality. Great hat. Keeps the sun out of your eyes without being too hot on your head. Handy little cord on the back that is low profile yet easy to adjust tightness on your head for those windy days. Great hat.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Awkward

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love almost everything on this booney hat. The lightweight, the width of the brim which will definitely protect your face and neck from the sun, make the hat ideal for any type of your outdoor activities. The only concern is the fact that Columbia produces it in one size only. Even though it adjustable but it will be good if we can have the size as close as our own measurement. Really wish the next generation could comes in various size, like S/M/L size.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Really cute hat!!
customer_reviews.text: OK - after reading reviews I expected this hat to look silly, actually it looks really nice! I got it for either my son or daughter who work outdoors and my son snatched it up! Its really nice and comfortable, and I am thinking of getting one for myself!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No Omni Wicking Fabric!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This hat is a complete waste of money. I ordered two one for my dad and one for myself. Both showed up without the Omni wicking fabric you see on the video posted with the hat. The soft Omni wick fabric is NOT INCLUDED on this hat. Beware before buying this is not genuine Columbia brand.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

product_meta.title: Columbia Unisex-Adult Bora Bora Booney
product_meta.description:
Make sunny fishing days a breeze with a hat that does it all. Columbia's Unisex Bora Bora II Booney Hat is the ultimate sun-shielder and moisture-wicker. High-quality materials and renowned technologies set Columbia's fishing gear and accessories apart from the rest.

 The Bora Bora II Booney fishing hat is crafted of our 100% comfortable nylon that feels lightweight and soft on the skin. The technologies that are featured in this hat are unmatched. Our signature wicking fabric makes up the ultra-sweat-wicking headband to keep your dry and comfortable; the mesh venting also works to breathe and pull moisture away from your skin. UPF 50 materials work hard against the sun to protect you from harmful UVA and UVB rays and long-term skin damage. A fishing hat isn't much without sun protection - that's why we only craft the best.

Columbia offers our Unisex Bora Bora II Booney Hat in multiple staple colors and sizes. To ensure the size you choose is just right, please refer to our sizing chart.
feature_bullets: Advanced technology: Columbia Unisex Bora Bora Booney fishing hat features our signature wicking fabric with sweat-wicking capabilities and UPF 50 Sun protection technology that helps shield you from harmful UVA and UVB rays.
Handy features: This high-performance fishing hat features a mesh breeze-inducing vent to keep you cool and protected during long hours outside and in the sun.
Adjustable features: It's equipped with an adjustable drawcord and toggle at the back for a fit that's adjustable and comfortable.
Sun-day wear: This hat is essential for any sunny day outside for its wide, protective brim. Mesh vents are non UPF

Omni-wick - The ultimate moisture management technology for the outdoors. Omni-wick quickly moves moisture from the skin into the fabric where it spreads across the surface to quickly evaporate—keeping you cool and your clothing dry.
